name: snabbdom-redux-starter
description: starter kit for snabbdom redux project, implementing yet another todo app

scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack --config webpack.server.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config webpack.config.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.server.config.js
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && webpack --config webpack.config.js && webpack -w --config webpack.server.config.js
scripts.start: webpack --config webpack.server.config.js -w & sleep 10; nodemon --debug dist/server.js --watch dist/server.js & node-inspector --web-port=9000 & webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --inline --hot --watch
scripts.start:static: rm -rf site/ && mkdir -p site/ && npm run build:static && NODE_ENV=production node dist/static.js

author: Andy Johnson <andyrjohnson82@gmail.com>
